body: @Ary369: I just stumbled upon this old one in my list and, even though this is late, here is my answer: Yuu-kun is the son and although Takashi (Yuu's father, Saori's husband) was forbidden to have sex with Saori, the sensei confirms it that Yuu inherited Takashi's blood (so this implies somehow either Yuu is conceived by insemination or a rare event of letting Takashi having sex with Saori), so don't go thinking just cuz it's forbidden that strictly 100% they haven't touched each other... It could be that sensei (crazy logic) let Takashi had some impregnating sex with Saori and boom, they had Yuu. From start to finish, this is a work of fiction, some logic don't make fucking sense so you should've learned by now not to question it cuz you know IT'S HENTAI.
The dad was a cuck, but the son is the most be got NTR’d

This is the most weird plot I've ever read. I mean, read at page 18 : that bald guy said that Saori and him are already in relationship teacher x student and lover. And then there is Takashi (husband) and Saori's classmate fell in love with her and married her even he know that Saori is teacher's woman. Takashi and Saori forbidden to have sex even after marriage. My question : WHO IS YUU-KUN? that bald teacher also said that Yuu-kun inherited Takashi's blood. Why Takashi (husband) can have a child if sex is forbidden for him???
Good sh*t, 6/10
